description: Create lets you code using plain text and images. Use it to build components, sites, designs, prototypes, products, tools and more.
title: Create - free-to-use AI app builder
introduction: Turn your words into sites, components, and tools built with code. Add GPT-4 and 40+ integrations in an instant.
features: Screenshot to code with GPT-4 Vision
targetPeople: Teams and individuals looking to build components, sites, prototypes, tools, and apps easily
